title: New: The 1975 – You (Andrea Remix)
body:
Latest Manchester buzzband **The 1975** have just released their new EP and have dropped a handful of remixes of various tracks to go alongside it.

Featuring several of the hottest producers around, **Andrea’s** remix of _You_ is the pick of the bunch, turning the future indie anthem into a laid back, spaced out number, perfect for Sunday evenings. Check it out below and grab a free download.
